mapper.select: select tb_id, db_name, tb_name from tb_info where tb_name like concat('%', #{tb_name}, '%')

select col_id, col_name, data_type, len, place, PK, not_null, uni from column_info where tb_id = (select tb_id from tb_info where tb_name = #{tb_name} and db_name = (select db_id from db_info where db_name = #{db_name}));
